trans-unit.source: $ kill -1 PASTER_PID
trans-unit.target: $ kill -1 PASTER_PID

trans-unit.source: $ paster serve ./cloudoo.conf –daemon
trans-unit.target: $粘贴服务./cloudoo.conf –daemon

trans-unit.source: $ paster serve ./cloudooo.conf
trans-unit.target: $粘贴服务./cloudooo.conf

trans-unit.source: $ python2.6 setup.py install
trans-unit.target: $ python2.6 setup.py安装

trans-unit.source: ‘soffice.bin’ is crashed; - finalize the process, verify if all the process was killed, start ‘soffice.bin’ and submit the document again(without restart the cloudooo)
trans-unit.target: 'soffice.bin'已崩溃；-完成流程，验证是否所有流程都被杀死，启动“ soffice.bin”并再次提交文档（无需重新启动cloudooo）

trans-unit.source: ‘soffice.bin’ is stalled; - finalize the process, start ‘soffice.bin’ and submit the document again(without restart the cloudooo);
trans-unit.target: 'soffice.bin'已停止；-完成流程，启动“ soffice.bin”并再次提交文档（无需重新启动cloudooo）；

trans-unit.source: ‘soffice.bin’ received the document and stalled; - if ‘soffice.bin’ isn’t responding, kill the process and start
trans-unit.target: 'soffice.bin'收到文档并停顿；-如果“ soffice.bin”没有响应，请终止进程并开始

trans-unit.source: Add OdfDocument
trans-unit.target: 添加OdfDocument

trans-unit.source: Add getImageItemList and getImage for OOGranulate
trans-unit.target: 为OOGranulate添加getImageItemList和getImage。

trans-unit.source: Add getParagraphItemList and getParagraphItem for OOGranulate
trans-unit.target: 为OOGranulate添加getParagraphItemList和getParagraphItem。

trans-unit.source: Add getTableItem, getTableItemList and getTableMatrix for OOGranulate
trans-unit.target: 为OOGranulate添加getTableItem、getTableItemList和getTableMatrix。

trans-unit.source: Add granulate interface.
trans-unit.target: 增加颗粒接口。

trans-unit.source: All clients receive the same object(proxy) when connects with XMLRPC Server.
trans-unit.target: 当与XMLRPC服务器连接时,所有客户端都会收到相同的对象(proxy)。

trans-unit.source: Change folder structure of cloudooo to put handler, mimemapper, helpers related to handler in same folder than handler.
trans-unit.target: 更改 cloudooo 的文件夹结构,将处理程序、mimemapper、与处理程序相关的帮助程序与处理程序放在同一个文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: Cloudooo Description
trans-unit.target: Cloudooo描述

trans-unit.source: Configuration file tells to cloudooo which handler must be loaded
trans-unit.target: 配置文件告诉cloudooo必须加载哪个处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Create Configuration File
trans-unit.target: 创建配置文件

trans-unit.source: Edit metadata of the document;
trans-unit.target: 编辑文件的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Eggify handlers
trans-unit.target: 蛋化处理机

trans-unit.source: Export to another format;
trans-unit.target: 导出为其他格式。

trans-unit.source: Fixed problem when a spreadsheet will be converted to html.
trans-unit.target: 修正了将电子表格转换为html时的问题。

trans-unit.source: Improve ERP5 compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 提高ERP5的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: Install Cloudooo
trans-unit.target: 安装Cloudooo

trans-unit.source: Install LibreOffice / OpenOffice.org
trans-unit.target: 安装 LibreOffice/OpenOffice.org

trans-unit.source: Install LibreOffice or OpenOffice.org.
trans-unit.target: 安装 LibreOffice 或 OpenOffice.org。

trans-unit.source: Invite document and return metadata only;
trans-unit.target: 邀请文件,只返回元数据。

trans-unit.source: Managing LibreOffice / OpenOffice.org process
trans-unit.target: 管理 LibreOffice/OpenOffice.org 进程。

trans-unit.source: No longer use Xvfb.
trans-unit.target: 不再使用Xvfb。

trans-unit.source: Only a process will have access to LibreOffice / OpenOffice.org by time.
trans-unit.target: 只有一个进程才能按时间访问LibreOffice/OpenOffice.org。

trans-unit.source: Problems and possible solution
trans-unit.target: 问题和可能的解决办法

trans-unit.source: PyUno is used to connect to LibreOffice / OpenOffice.org stated with open socket. The features will be handled all by pyuno.
trans-unit.target: PyUno是用来连接到LibreOffice/OpenOffice.org的,用开放的socket表示。这些功能将全部由pyuno处理。

trans-unit.source: Refactor code to use json instead of jsonpickle.
trans-unit.target: 重构代码,使用json代替jsonpickle。

trans-unit.source: Refactor runCloudOOoUnitTest.py to control better the daemon process
trans-unit.target: 重构runCloudOOoUnitTest.py以更好地控制守护进程。

trans-unit.source: Refactor tests to use boolean asserts to validate True or False.
trans-unit.target: 重构测试,使用布尔断言来验证真或假。

trans-unit.source: Remove all attributes that works with cloudooo script paths.
trans-unit.target: 删除所有与cloudooo脚本路径配合的属性。

trans-unit.source: Remove entry points, treat those as ordinary files.
trans-unit.target: 去掉切入点,把这些切入点当成普通的文件。

trans-unit.source: Run Application
trans-unit.target: 运行应用程序

trans-unit.source: Search all script files using pkg_resources.
trans-unit.target: 使用 pkg_resources 搜索所有脚本文件。

trans-unit.source: Send document to ‘soffice.bin’ and return the document converted with metadata;
trans-unit.target: 发送文档到“ soffice.bin”并返回用元数据转换的文档；

trans-unit.source: Stop Application
trans-unit.target: 停止申请

trans-unit.source: Support LibreOffice3.3rc3.
trans-unit.target: 支持 LibreOffice3.3rc3。

trans-unit.source: The configuration file is used to start the application using paster. $ cp ./cloudooo/samples/samples.conf . # Copy to current folder
trans-unit.target: 该配置文件用于使用paster启动应用程序。$ cp ./cloudooo/samples/samples.conf 。#复制到当前文件夹

trans-unit.source: The document that was sent is corrupt; - write in log the error and verify that the process aren’t in memory
trans-unit.target: 发送的文档已损坏；-在日志中记录错误并验证进程是否不在内存中

trans-unit.source: The next step is define some attributes in cloudooo.conf:
trans-unit.target: 下一步是在cloudooo.conf中定义一些属性。

trans-unit.source: The pyuno opens a new document, write, add metadata and returns the document edited or converted to xmlrpc and it return the document to the user;
trans-unit.target: pyuno打开一个新的文档,写,添加元数据,并返回文档编辑或转换为xmlrpc,它返回文档给用户。

trans-unit.source: Update interface (not implemented yet)
trans-unit.target: 更新接口(尚未实施)

trans-unit.source: Use all scripts according to your python eggs.
trans-unit.target: 根据你的python蛋使用所有的脚本。

trans-unit.source: Use argparse instead of optparse
trans-unit.target: 使用argparse代替opparse

trans-unit.source: Use python-magic to validate the output documents according to mimetype.
trans-unit.target: 使用python-magic根据mimetype验证输出文档。

trans-unit.source: Warning: always use SIGHUP because only with this signal all processes are stopped correctly.
trans-unit.target: 警告:始终使用SIGHUP,因为只有在这个信号下,所有进程才会正确停止。

trans-unit.source: Warnings:
trans-unit.target: 警告:

trans-unit.source: When finalize the use of ‘soffice.bin’, should make sure that it was finalized;
trans-unit.target: 最终确定对“ soffice.bin”的使用时，应确保其已完成；

trans-unit.source: XML-RPC document conversion server
trans-unit.target: XML-RPC文档转换服务器

trans-unit.source: XMLRPC + WSGI will be one bridge for easy access to LibreOffice / OpenOffice.org. This will implement one XMLRPC server into WSGI (Paster).
trans-unit.target: XMLRPC+WSGI将是一座桥梁,方便访问LibreOffice/OpenOffice.org。这将实现一个XMLRPC服务器到WSGI(Paster)。

trans-unit.source: XMLRPC Server - XMLRPC + WSGI
trans-unit.target: XMLRPC服务器-XMLRPC+WSGI。

trans-unit.source: XMLRPC receives a file and connects to ‘soffice.bin’ process by pyuno;
trans-unit.target: XMLRPC接收文件并通过pyuno连接到'soffice.bin'进程；

trans-unit.source: control ‘soffice.bin’; - If the socket lose the connection, cloudooo kills the process, restartes processes and submit again the file;
trans-unit.target: 控制'soffice.bin'; -如果套接字失去连接，cloudooo将终止进程，重新启动进程并再次提交文件；

trans-unit.source: modified way that the filters of OpenOffice.org are passed.
trans-unit.target: 修改了OpenOffice.org的过滤器的传递方式。

trans-unit.source: move internal scripts to helper folder.
trans-unit.target: 将内部脚本移至帮助文件夹。

trans-unit.source: or run as a daemon:
trans-unit.target: 或作为守护进程运行。

trans-unit.source: removed cloudooo as dependency of internal scripts.
trans-unit.target: 删除了 cloudooo 作为内部脚本的依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: soffice_binary_path - folder where soffice.bin is installed (ex. /opt/libreoffice/program/)
trans-unit.target: soffice_binary_path-安装soffice.bin的文件夹(例如:/opt/libreoffice/program/)。
启动'soffice.bin'; -Pyuno启动'soffice.bin'进程，并且通过套接字进行通信；-'soffice.bin'进程在后台运行；

trans-unit.source: uno_path - folder where UNO library is installed (ex. /opt/libreoffice/basis-link/program/)
trans-unit.target: uno_path-安装UNO库的文件夹(例如:/opt/libreoffice/basis-link/program/)。

trans-unit.source: use pkg_resources to get helper scripts.
trans-unit.target: 使用 pkg_resources 来获取辅助脚本。

trans-unit.source: working_path - folder to run the application. This folder need be created.
trans-unit.target: working_path-运行应用程序的文件夹。这个文件夹需要创建。

trans-unit.source: you must have installed setuptools>=0.6c11 in this python.
trans-unit.target: 您必须在此python中安装了setuptools> = 0.6c11。
